title: Bean sprouts with blue cheese sauce
author: Jon Preece
description: A buttery, cheesy, delicious meal for the whole family
instructions: Start by boiling the bean sprouts for 2 to 3 minutes, once cooked drain them.
In a separate pan, add a large blob of butter, the blue cheese and cream cheese. Add a pinch of salt and pepper to taste.
Transfer the bean sprouts into the cheese mixture, simmer for 2 to 3 minutes and serve.
